title: Ontology-Based Performance Coaching and Transformative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Concepts and Self-Directed Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Applying an ontology-based coaching framework using digital devices, linked to career exploration in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners must write and submit at least three reflective journals using an ontology-based coaching tool to induce self-awareness changes
Learners must analyze two cases of inconsistency between personal beliefs and actions and establish improvement plans by applying a transformative learning model
Learners must propose one practical solution applying coaching experiences to social problem-solving through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
